com.github.mikephil.charting.formatter

Class LargeValueFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mikephil.charting.formatter.ValueFormatter
      • com.github.mikephil.charting.formatter.LargeValueFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAxisValueFormatter, IValueFormatter

    public class LargeValueFormatter
extends ValueFormatter
    Predefined value-formatter that formats large numbers in a pretty way. Outputs: 856 = 856; 1000 = 1k; 5821 = 5.8k; 10500 = 10k; 101800 = 102k; 2000000 = 2m; 7800000 = 7.8m; 92150000 = 92m; 123200000 = 123m; 9999999 = 10m; 1000000000 = 1b; Special thanks to Roman Gromov (https://github.com/romangromov) for this piece of code.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LargeValueFormatter() 
      LargeValueFormatter(java.lang.String appendix)
      Creates a formatter that appends a specified text to the result string
